name: Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2
description:
Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2 is an action, shooter, simulation and sports game developed by Fun Labs, Magic Wand Productions and Sand Grain Studios. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Activision Blizzard. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play Cabela's Dangerous Hunts 2 on PlayStation 2, Xbox, GameCube and PC.
